translations: n.代理权，代表权；代理人，代表；（测算用的）代替物，指标；投票委托书

sentences.sentence: You can vote either in person or by proxy.
sentences.translation: 你可以亲自投票或请人代理。

sentences.sentence: Your proxy will need to sign the form on your behalf.
sentences.translation: 你的代理人将须代表你在表格上签字。

sentences.sentence: Then they simply checked which directors stayed from one proxy statement to the next.
sentences.translation: 接下来，他们只是检查哪些董事更换过代理声明。
